channel.title: Player kills player += 1

item.title: Player kills player += 1
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well, you mustve made a void for your zammy/sara points. Then, a point system. To make that, use Mod Taharok’s Skill Making tutorial except just add it with the part like this.

GetLevelForXP[20];

Hope I helped atleast a little :)[br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2007, 05:22:09 PM[/size][hr]Um… So what… I sold mage logs to N0valyfe… Niether ones are important to other people…

Read full topic

item.title: Player kills player += 1
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok for my clan system im trying to make it so that when a player in the zamorak clan kills a player in the saradomin clan, the zamorak team gains 1 point. can someone check to see if this code works. (i cant do mopar on this cpu, the one i can is 2 miles away).

if ((playerIsInZamorakClan =true) && (playerIsInSaradominClan = true && playerLevel[3] = 0)) { zamorakClanPoints += 1; }
would that work. i cant test it right now i just want to know that if i set the ints and booleans right, will this code work.

Read full topic
